commit.message:
Add icons and position-based ordering for voices

- Installed react-icons package
- Added Font Awesome icons for each voice (brain, heart, question, cloud)
- Voices now ordered by position of trigger phrase in text
- Updated VoiceComment component with icon display
- Added CSS for icon and header layout
